snippet: Tight end Rob Gronkowski will miss the New England Patriots' opener against the Arizona Cardinals on Sunday night because of a hamstring injury....
lead_paragraph: Tight end Rob Gronkowski will miss the New England Patriots' opener against the Arizona Cardinals on Sunday night because of a hamstring injury.

headline.main: Patriots Say Rob Gronkowski, 2 Others Will Miss Opener
headline.print_headline: Patriots Say Rob Gronkowski, 2 Others Will Miss Opener
